name: VIDEO: Rooms Reserved for COVID-19 Recovery
description: The County has made our most vulnerable populations a top priority during the Coronavirus pandemic. Hundreds of hotel rooms have been reserved for anyone who is symptomatic and experiencing homelessness or unable to quarantine from their family. And health care workers are onsite for support.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: The County has made our most vulnerable populations a top priority during the Coronavirus pandemic. Hundreds of hotel rooms have been reserved for anyone who is symptomatic and experiencing homelessness or unable to quarantine from their family. And health care workers are onsite for support.
